Plot: In a magical world, small but brave Tom Little embarks on the adventure of a lifetime to release the kingdom from a spell and win the hand of a beautiful princess. But who is his true love: the king's daughter or the courageous thief?
Title: The Princess and the Magic Mirror
Writer: José Martí (original story), Ernesto Padrón, Édouard René Lefebvre de Laboulaye (original classic fairytale)
Actors: Carlos Blanco, Monti Castiñeiras, María Castro, Luis Iglesia
